OOC: Is this me or is this fight going nowhere?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy from your earlier post Thirst was a short distance from 
void. 
> There is no way he would be PBR at the moment. And as for the acid 
it is 
> covering his entire body. If he ejected his armor he'd be screwed 
anyway 
> because the acid in the cloud would just cling to his now exposed 
super 
> structure which noone can eject because it is the body itself. And 
as for the 
> flames sticking to void, even if they did it would have been put out 
> immediately by his body. Thank you dewboy for screwing your 
charachter over.
> 
> IC:
> 
> As the four not so point blank range plasma blasts fly out at Void, 
he 
> quickly ducks to avoid them. At the same time the acidic cloud once 
again 
> expels a red acidic ooze all over thirst now eating away at his very 
> structure.
